instructions: Preheat oven to 350Â°F. Grease 9-inch square pan.

In a bowl, combine sugar, flour, cocoa, baking powder, and salt. Stir in milk, oil, and vanilla until smooth. Spread batter in prepared pan. Sprinkle brown sugar and nuts over batter. Pour hot water over all. Do not stir.
Bake for 40 to 45 minutes, or until cake is set and pudding is bubbling around edges. Serve warm with whipped cream, if desired.
